query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN isActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active, SUM(CASE WHEN isActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inactive FROM cnrtp_routes
